transArray.content: As soon as you enter the hotel lobby, you will see a bowl full of oranges, which is particularly in line with the characteristics of an orange hotel. The rooms are fully equipped, clean and tidy, and the breakfast is especially rich in Chinese and Western food. Parking is free, and it is also very close to the subway station. The transportation is convenient

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Thank you very much for your recognition of the hotel's breakfast. The hotel's breakfast time is from 7:00 to 11:00. The Chinese and Western buffet breakfast has a variety of varieties, is nutritious and delicious, freshly cooked noodles, hot soup noodles and snacks. Pastries satisfy your special delicacies without leaving home, the hotel's attentive service, and a cup of hot tea make you feel at home. Thank you very much for your recognition of the room attendant and room hygiene, which can bring you a good stay experience. We are very happy. The hotel strictly abides by Huazhu Group's room cleaning procedures. Linens are changed and disinfected after each guest. We will continue to work hard to provide every guest with a comfortable and secure stay. All hotel staff look forward to your next visit. ,wish you a happy life. General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
